name: Smart Home
description:
With this extension, you can control miscellaneous smart devices on your local network:
 * Home Assistant (lights, plugs, covers, scenes)
 * Philips Hue (Bridge, Syncbox, sync screen, sync music)
 * Nanoleaf devices (lights, scenes, sync screen)
 * Ikea Dirigera (lights, plugs, covers)
 * Shelly devices (lights, plugs, covers)

Please, report issues or bugs on GitHub.
